mapper.select: SELECT SUM(oi.ordersalesprice * oi.orderqty) AS userSales, o.usercd AS userCd, u.usernm AS userNm FROM M_ORDER_ITEM oi INNER JOIN M_ORDER o ON oi.orderno = o.orderno INNER JOIN M_USER u ON o.usercd = u.usercd WHERE MONTH(o.orderdate) = #{month} AND o.status = 'APRV_CMPT' GROUP BY o.usercd, u.usernm ORDER BY userSales DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT SUM(oi.ordersalesprice * oi.orderqty) AS buyerSales, o.buyercd AS buyerCd, b.buyernm AS buyerNm FROM M_ORDER_ITEM oi INNER JOIN M_ORDER o ON oi.orderno = o.orderno INNER JOIN M_BUYER b ON o.buyercd = b.buyercd WHERE MONTH(o.orderdate) = #{month} AND o.status = 'APRV_CMPT' GROUP BY o.buyercd, b.buyernm ORDER BY buyerSales DESC LIMIT 10
